title: After issue of occupation certificate of rehabilitation building/s, and formation and registration of Co-operative Housing Society 30% of total Slum T
clause_text: After issue of occupation certificate of rehabilitation building/s, and formation and registration of Co-operative Housing Society 30% of total Slum T.D.R. permissible shall be released.
section: Notwithstanding the provisions in clause mentioned above, if the developer does not desire to consume the full permissible in-situ F.S.I. on the same site, in such a case :

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: After issue of occupation certificate of rehabilitation building/s, and formation and registration of Co-operative Housing Society 30% of total Slum T.D.R. permissible shall be released.
